name: session-manager-mobile
description: Capacitor Android build scaffolding for TermStation (devtools/terminals)

scripts.android:add: npx @capacitor/cli add android && node scripts/patch-android-security.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-fontscale.mjs
scripts.android:sync: npx @capacitor/cli sync android && node scripts/patch-android-security.mjs && node scripts/patch-android-fontscale.mjs
scripts.android:build: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build:release: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android:run: npm run android:sync && cd android && ./gradlew installDebug
